评论详情: They fit my daughter's arms well (she's thin) without falling down to her wrists. She love the look of them. I'd buy her more if she wants!
They are really pretty, not too tight for me, and very good quality . Honestly I'm pretty surprised on how comfy they are.
My daughter loves these! Fits perfectly
She's been wearing them everyday since she got them! She said they keep her hands and arms warm and that they are soft and comfortable.
They turned out to be better than expected.  Also a great vanue

I love these! I got the star pattern and the gloves are absolutely beautiful. They have a colorful/holographic like sparkle, and the length is perfect. My only minor complaint is that they are quite tight, especially towards the upper arm. I have relatively thin arms and they are so tight, I have a little "muffin top" on my arms near the top seam. My 12 year old daughter loved them, tried them on, took them off 10 seconds later, saying they were "too tight". But they are gorgeous and I do not regret my purchase. Hopefully as I wear them, they will stretch out a bit. Overall, I'm a happy customer.
